Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Houston in 1986...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/12/1989, off Rich Gossage (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/13/1990, off Steve Brown (ATL)...
Injured on 5/19/1992 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Released by Houston on 9/8/1994...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/12/1997 to a 2-year deal worth $1,640,000 per year...
